credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: The Tenth International Lighting Design Competition, 1983
description: In top third of poster, a multicolored arc like a rainbow in white, yellow, green, blue and purple. Below it, similar but larger arc in same colors. Across bottom, text in white reads: "'83/ the 10th/ tokyo/ international lighting design competition/ Theme: Lighting as Communication." Black background.
name: Poster
